login.title: Log In
login.subtitle: Unlock advanced skin analysis with explainable AI
login.description: Our platform offers powerful tools for skin disease diagnostics powered by AI technology. Sign in to access detailed reports, personal history and XAI-based explanations.

register.subtitle: Create an account to get an advanced analysis of the affected skin area using explainable AI.
register.description: Gain access to detailed diagnostic reports, query history, and clear visualizations of key areas to help understand the results and take better care of your skin.
register.title: Sign Up

errors.passLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.futureDate: Date cannot be in the future
errors.minAge: You must be at least 13 years old
